On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on Sirius XM Patriot channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM EST, host and Breitbart News executive chairman Stephen K. Bannon will discuss the results from the New York primary and what it means for the presidential race going forward.

Randy Barnett, the Carmack Waterhouse Professor of Legal Theory at the Georgetown University Law Center and the Director of the Georgetown Center for the Constitution, will discuss his new book Our Republican Constitution: Securing the Liberty and Sovereignty of We the People.

Special guests include: GOP strategist Roger Stone, veteran pollster and Cruz-aligned Super PAC head Kellyanne Conway, and Center for Security Policy president and Cruz foreign policy adviser Frank Gaffney.

Sirius XM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
We’ll also hear from Breitbart’s Ken Klukowski about the uncertain fate of Obama’s executive amnesty in the hands of the Supreme Court.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
Listeners may call into the show at: 866-957-2874.
